snippet.title: NABOKOS Trailer | A Minimalist Puzzle Game
snippet.description:
Inspired by Sokoban, logic gates and magnetism, NABOKOS is a minimalist puzzle game, a hugely pulling puzzle game. Experience the magic of figuring out how to escape the level. No hints. No hand holding. Go for Gold! Take it a step further and try your hand at creating your own levels using the game's intuitive integrated level editor!

GAME FEATURES:
 - Sokoban-style puzzle gameplay
 - Use the magnet to pull red boxes onto gold buttons
 - Escape the level by activating doors and logic gates
 - Craft your own levels using the integrated level editor

Download the game at https://pixelgrapher.itch.io/nabokos

Trailer music 'Ever Turning Mind' by Dexter Britain
https://dexterbritain.com/
